arts.ttl: Werder Bremen vs Union Berlin preview: Grün-Weißen look to continue winning run
arts.sum: In the final round of fixtures before the winter break, Werder Bremen are looking to secure a third straight win in all competitions as they welcome Union Berlin to Weserstadion on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Werder Bremen vs. Union Berlin - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Werder Bremen and Union Berlin, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.

arts.ttl: Vertessen named as possible replacement for injured Jeong against Werder
arts.sum: Union Berlin coach Bo Svensson has named Yorbe Vertessen as a candidate to replace the injured Woo-yeong Jeong against Werder Bremen.
